title: Prefigurative Community Building (Part 13): Reclaiming Shelter Together - Building Community Land Trusts as a Power With Strategy
summary: Create Community Land Trusts that ensure permanently affordable housing by separating land ownership from housing ownership. Build democratic land stewardship that serves the common good.

Community.summary: Build community-controlled land ownership that prevents displacement and speculation.

level0: Start with listening and mapping housing displacement in your area
Form seed group committed to Power With values
level1: Study legal frameworks and identify potential land for acquisition
Create legal entity with mission for community-controlled housing
level2: Raise funding while maintaining community autonomy
Acquire land collectively through pooled resources or advocacy
level3: Design housing with and for the community
Implement governance that shares power democratically

Power.summary: Transform land from commodity to commons through collective stewardship.

level0: Use sociocracy or consensus methods to prevent Power Over dynamics
Center voices of unhoused, renters, and precariously housed
level1: Create tripartite boards with residents, community, and public representation
level2: Include housing-insecure people as stewards and leaders, not just clients
Implement assemblies that include both residents and non-residents
level3: Build federated networks of CLTs for regional land justice
Model democratic land ownership for broader community

Knowledge.summary: Learn community land development while sharing organizing and governance skills.

level0: Learn about zoning laws, land ownership, and community development
Study successful CLT models and their governance structures
level1: Develop skills in participatory planning and consensus decision-making
Learn legal and financial tools for community land ownership
level2: Host workshops and educational events about CLTs
Share knowledge about democratic land stewardship
level3: Become regional resource for community land trust development
Train others in Power With land organizing
